april.vis
Class DefaultPopupMenu

java.lang.Object
  april.vis.VisEventAdapter
      april.vis.DefaultPopupMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
VisEventHandler
public class DefaultPopupMenu
extends VisEventAdapter

We re-create a jmenu with every right click; this makes it easier for us to set checkbox menu items appropriately without requiring every change of camera settings to fiddle with the popup menu.
